name: Customer Experience & Marketing Manager MEGA
description:
Customer Experience & Marketing Manager MEGA Samara or

Customer Experience (Marketing) Manager MEGA Samara

Ingka Centres is on a journey to create new kind of destination: vibrant Meeting Places rooted with IKEA values that serve the needs of the community.

​A Meeting Place is a physical and/or a virtual place where the many people meet, find what they need, and connect with their communities and the world. It is an essential and meaningful place in people's everyday lives. Every Meeting Place is unique because the concept involves local context, soul anchors and customer's needs & desires.

We currently operate under different brands: LIVAT in China, MEGA in Russia and the Smiling Shopping bag in Europe.

Purpose of the job:

  • The Customer Experience Manager drives the development of customer experience and marketing agenda to support the Meeting Places.
  • Enable the Meeting Place to provide enjoyable, memorable and personalized customer experiences before during and after the visit, both online and offline.

Assignments:

  • Creates and manages the Customer experience/Marketing Program for the Meeting Place. Supports the new business opportunities and developing the communication with our customers.
  • Identifies and defines local customer groups and their customer journey.
  • Provides outstanding customer services together with partners and communities in order to make the customer experience convenient and enjoyable. Defines, implement and innovates new customer services (ex. relevant delivery service, loyalty programs, information services etc.).
  • Monitors and analyses performance and customer interaction level with customer touchpoints. Puts customer feedbacks (off-line, social media, researches) into action to improve the Meeting Place performance.
  • Actively works on localizing the Meeting place concept through uniqueness in touch points (both off-line and on-line) and ensures consistency from the Customer experience perspective. Ensures the total ambience of the Meeting Place.
  • Plan, create and integrate promotion of events/campaign/marketing activities into all medias, including promotion via digital tools, ATL, PR support. Communicate and cooperate with local agencies.
  • Drive and develops the Customer experience/Marketing competence within the Meeting Place (including own team and partners) using relevant methods, and ensure our customers are engaged into the quick prototyping of the new ideas and concepts.
  • Contribute to engage with our customers to improve the sustainability performance of the Meeting place (People Planet Positive Strategy), communicate the vision and benefits of our sustainability agenda. Contribute to encourage partners to inspire & enable our visitors to lead more healthy and sustainable lifestyles.
  • Drives costs Budget planning process, responsible for the cost part of P&L in his/her area of responsibility, and follow-up in close cooperation with relevant stakeholders.

Education, professional experience and skills

  • Business understanding and a background from working in a customer focused, fast-paced and multichannel environment.
  • Experienced in creating and implementing mid-term tactical plans and following up goals.
  • Proven customer-focused mind-set.
  • Assertive with the ability to influence through the use of customer insight.
  • Experience in problem-solving and conflict-management.
  • Management position experience in a people-centric organization, and ability to lead in a changing environment.
  • Proven Project management skills
  • Fluent in English language
